name: PowerRouter
headline: PowerRouter helps sales teams with lead routing in Salesforce
description: PowerRouter helps sales teams assign leads and contacts to the right reps, instantly within Salesforce.  We provide a powerful automation engine with a drag and drop canvas to create routing rules, visually.  With actionable metrics to increase speed-to-lead and account based sales support, we make it very simple to stay on top of every lead in your Salesforce CRM.
generated_description:
### PowerRouter: Streamlining Sales Lead Management

**Website:** [powerrouter.io](https://www.powerrouter.io)  
**Founded:** 2021 (Y Combinator Batch W21)  
**Location:** Austin, TX  
**Team Size:** 3 employees  
**Group Partner:** Brad Flora

---

**Mission:**  
PowerRouter is crafted to enhance lead routing within Salesforce, ensuring that sales teams can swiftly assign leads and contacts to the right representatives. The company's automation engine features an intuitive drag-and-drop canvas for creating routing rules visually. By providing actionable insights, PowerRouter significantly boosts the speed at which leads are handled, thereby improving account-based sales capabilities.

---

**What They Do:**  
Initially focused solely on lead and contact assignment, PowerRouter now offers a suite of products designed to automate and optimize lead routing workflows. Key functionalities include:

- **Routing Pro:** Streamlined tools for lead assignment that prevent confusion and enhance accountability.
- **Data Management:** Automated duplicate detection to maintain data integrity and improve sales efficiency.
- **ABX Orchestration:** Customizable workflows that ensure leads are directed to the optimal accounts without overlap.
- **Dynamic Territories & Power Pipeline:** Solutions to match leads with the right accounts effortlessly.

The emphasis is on creating a seamless experience within Salesforce, where businesses can integrate these tools and watch their sales efficiency soar.

---

**Value Proposition:**  
PowerRouter is about more than just automation—it's about eliminating revenue leaks. Companies that engage with PowerRouter can expect:

- **Faster Responses:** Speed is crucial; quickly addressing leads increases conversion potential dramatically.
- **Data Accuracy:** Avoiding duplicates can double sales productivity, making it easier for teams to focus on engaging with potential customers.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Complex workflows can be established in minutes, not days, enabling teams to pivot quickly in today’s fast-paced market.

---

**Customer Testimonials:**  
PowerRouter has garnered positive feedback from various industry leaders. Users report not only enhanced efficiency but also a significant reduction in lead leakage. With features that seamlessly integrate into existing Salesforce setups, clients express gratitude for the time saved and remarkable improvements in their sales processes.

---

PowerRouter is setting a new standard for sales teams navigating the complexities of modern CRM systems. By focusing on lead routing and operational efficiency, they empower businesses to convert leads more effectively and collaboratively, all within the familiar environment of Salesforce. 

If you’re looking to supercharge your lead management, you might want to [book a demo](https://www.powerrouter.io/free-demo/) and see how PowerRouter can energize your sales efforts.
